author: slava77
body:
apparently arrays are not default-constructed and we get random values ```TICLCandidate::idProbabilities_``` presently, in absence of settings by the current version of ```TICLCandidateFromTrackstersProducer```.
I checked on wf 23234.0 that zeroes are now appearing instead of something random
title: initialize std::array data member in TICLCandidate
